TopicTitle: Can this be gifted to another account?

Articles.Content: My friend wants the game and i said i would buy it for him, but i dont get the option to gift, can it be done?

You can gift the game to someone by using a throwaway email to create a new Store account. Purchase the game, clear any personal info from the account, then give the person the email and password to access the account. They can then download the game and change the account information to their own.

Cheers!
